dict.acceptation: 出口，通道；退场；退去，退出；死亡；

sent.orig: From terminal emulation uses EXIT command.
sent.trans: 退出终端仿真器使用EXIT命令。

sent.orig: Enter configuration commands, one per line. End with command exit!
sent.trans: 输入配置命令，以行为单位，以EXIT命令结束！

sent.orig: When you press exit, the screen return to normal live video display of the far end.
sent.trans: 当按Exit时，屏幕会返回正常的远端实时视频显示状态。

sent.orig: Four exits. Sorted by direction: South-east exit, north-east exit, south-west exit and north-west exit.
sent.trans: 有4个。按方向分为：东南出口、东北出口、西南出口、西北出口。

sent.orig: The supplier will be eligible to exit Containment after meeting the established exit criteria.
sent.trans: 供应商有资格退出可控制策略，在满足已制定的退出标准后。
